TopicTitle: I'm visiting the Space Center today!

Articles.Content: So today I'm taking my nieces over to the Visitors complex. Should be fun, especially because last time I didn't get to do quite everything I wanted and now I get to actually share all my knowledge about it all.

So today I'm taking my nieces over to the Visitors complex. Should be fun' date=' especially because last time I didn't get to do quite everything I wanted and now I get to actually share all my knowledge about it all.[/quote']

Which space center? Have fun!

Sounds like something that burden all us geek. We have all these so very interesting things in our head and we so want to let other knows about it, but not everyone is particularly interested in orbital mechanics when you talk about it during lunch break. So we wait until we have a moment where talking about it is appropriate, like a visit to the space center!

Which space center? Have fun!

Kennedy of course. Live not 5 minutes away

Kennedy of course. Live not 5 minutes away

Nice! It's been a long time since I've been there. Any new major highlights?
